message_1: A company has collected data on the salaries of their employees. They want to group their employees into three clusters based on their salary data. The dataset includes 20 employees and their respective salaries. Using the k-means clustering technique, determine the three clusters and report the mean salary of each cluster.
message_2: To perform k-means clustering, I will need the salary data for the 20 employees. Please provide the salary data for the 20 employees.
